approvedComponents.name: Partner Logos
approvedComponents.feedback: Needs better icons but yes having our partners is cool, include Denham Aerodrome

approvedComponents.name: Fleet Showcase Carousel
approvedComponents.feedback: This is a nice component for the Robinson helicopters in the sale page, could use a little work but a good start. The R66 shouldn't appear in black with the word 'popular' - it should appear like any other

approvedComponents.name: Social Proof Wall
approvedComponents.feedback: We should have a 'Join Our Community' section with the Instagram, Facebook and YouTube socials

approvedComponents.name: Why Choose Us
approvedComponents.feedback: Not a pretty component but 'Why Choose Us' could be a valuable component

approvedComponents.name: Founder Story
approvedComponents.feedback: We need a founder section but it has to be really good, creative and beautiful

approvedComponents.name: Before & After Story
approvedComponents.feedback: This would be nice in the PPL(H) details page

approvedComponents.name: Team Preview
approvedComponents.feedback: We need to take a team photograph as well - have helicopters lined up and have all the employees in uniform lined up on multiple rows to also showcase how big our workforce is. Then we need the 'Our Team' component but this component is really ugly so we need to make some variations of this that look better
approvedComponents.actionRequired: Take team photograph with helicopters and uniformed employees

approvedComponents.name: Process Steps
approvedComponents.feedback: Add this to the PPL(H) details page and as you scroll one of the dots will fill with colour and text will appear in the middle describing each step
approvedComponents.interactivity: scroll-based animation with dot fill and text reveal

approvedComponents.name: Call-to-Action Split
approvedComponents.feedback: The 'Book a Trial Flight' component needs to appear in the discovery flight page. This component is ugly so it needs work but the sentiment is there

approvedComponents.name: Location Highlight
approvedComponents.feedback: Instead of 'Free Parking' say 'On Site Parking'. Instead of 1990 write 2010

approvedComponents.name: FAQ Accordion
approvedComponents.feedback: We've got to include common questions but they have to be specific to where you have navigated to. This UI is not very good though - I prefer one that I had developed. When it comes to it just ask me or add a note for me to give you the details about the UI I like
approvedComponents.note: ASK USER for preferred UI design details

approvedComponents.name: Recent News
approvedComponents.feedback: Important page

approvedComponents.feedback: This timeline will be great to have

approvedComponents.feedback: Get pictures from everyone in different places - Sardinia, Corsica, Scotland, Iceland, Greenland etc. Just go ham - Norway, get images from HQers
approvedComponents.actionRequired: Collect expedition photos from HQ team members

approvedComponents.name: Hangarage Features
approvedComponents.feedback: Yes hangarage is a good one to have like this. Make the full list of benefits, including proximity to Central London

approvedComponents.name: R88 Announcement
approvedComponents.feedback: Yes let's have a component like this for each type then, have the side profile though

approvedComponents.feedback: Pricing page is important. Include pricing into PPL page and CPL page

approvedComponents.name: Mega Footer
approvedComponents.feedback: Yes we need a cool footer. We need a good footer

approvedComponents.feedback: I like the idea of having a benefit component. Make a complete list of the benefits - door to door etc.

approvedComponents.feedback: This component looks absolutely beautiful. Beautiful.

approvedComponents.feedback: Good idea to take deposits from people at a set price, softens the blow of price increases. I wonder if the same thing could be done for maintenance

approvedComponents.feedback: I like it but not sure where we would put it. Don't make any omissions from the provided list
